about_the_game:
Cuties Hacked is a new spin on the classic arcade formula of Xonix, that rewards your reflexes and skills with sets of beautifully crafted arts featuring some of the hottest girls you have ever seen.
Prepare to avoid obstacles and opponents, use boosts to your advantage, and beat target times to unveil hotter and hotter pictures from the phones of cuties you have been dreaming about.

  • 12 different cuties await a challenger to hack their phones.
  • Explore different settings serving as a background for the phenomenal beauty of girls
  • Expose the covered areas of the pictures and, eventually, reveal the whole picture
  • Unlock the door to the secretive contents of girls' phones - make sure that no one is looking above your shoulder as these pics are saucy and not safe for work!
  • Pay attention to the obstacles that will get in your way – you may have a few chances but be wary as the number of attempts is limited!

content_descriptors.notes: Nudity, Partial Nudity, Sexual Content, Sexual Themes

detailed_description:
Cuties Hacked is a new spin on the classic arcade formula of Xonix, that rewards your reflexes and skills with sets of beautifully crafted arts featuring some of the hottest girls you have ever seen.
Prepare to avoid obstacles and opponents, use boosts to your advantage, and beat target times to unveil hotter and hotter pictures from the phones of cuties you have been dreaming about.

  • 12 different cuties await a challenger to hack their phones.
  • Explore different settings serving as a background for the phenomenal beauty of girls
  • Expose the covered areas of the pictures and, eventually, reveal the whole picture
  • Unlock the door to the secretive contents of girls' phones - make sure that no one is looking above your shoulder as these pics are saucy and not safe for work!
  • Pay attention to the obstacles that will get in your way – you may have a few chances but be wary as the number of attempts is limited!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100+ or AMD FX-4100+
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GT 720+ or AMD HD 5450+ or Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14
  • Processor: Intel i5 2400+ or AMD Phenom II X4 850+
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GTX 750+ or AMD Radeon HD 7770M+ or Intel HD Graphics 5300+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+ Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100+ or AMD FX-4100+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GT 720+ or AMD HD 5450+ or Intel HD Graphics 5000+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+ Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel i5 2400+ or AMD Phenom II X4 850+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GTX 750+ or AMD Radeon HD 7770M+ or Intel HD Graphics 5300+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Cuties Hacked: Oh no someone stole my photos!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100+ or AMD FX-4100+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, nVidia GT 720+ or AMD HD 5450+ or Intel HD Graphics 5000+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 2400+ or AMD Phenom II X4 850+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM, nVidia GTX 750+ or AMD Radeon HD 7770M+ or Intel HD Graphics 5300+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Cuties Hacked is a new spin on the classic arcade formula of Xonix, that rewards your reflexes and skills with sets of beautifully crafted arts featuring some of the hottest girls you have ever seen.
supported_languages: English, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian
